channel.title: Only logg on using a client
channel.description: is there away u can only logg on to a server buy using a client because i posted a download link on my server status and no1 is using it sorry but most people are retards saying they are using it is there a away saying liek plesase downloa dthe client to use the server thx?

item.title: Only logg on using a client
item.dc:creator: @xXx_JAVA_OWNZ_U_xXx xXx JAVA OWNZ U xXx
item.description:
@xXx_JAVA_OWNZ_U_xXx wrote:

Do you even have your own client?

Read full topic
item.source: Only logg on using a client

item.title: Only logg on using a client
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

If you want them to use only your client, make it write out your client’s UID. Then declare in client.java

if(UID != w/e it is) {
sendMessage(“Please use my client”);
disconnected = true;
}

Declare that in the run method.

Read full topic
item.source: Only logg on using a client

item.title: Only logg on using a client
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Have the server send a packet to your client.
You’ll have to make the packet in the client, first.

Read full topic
